description: Test suite for the NotificationProvider class in a Flutter frontend project, including mocks and various unit tests for loading, adding, updating, and querying notifications.

classes.name: NotificationProvider
classes.description: Manages notifications data, loading from database, updating, and filtering notifications.

classes.name: MockDatabaseService
classes.description: Mock implementation of DatabaseService used for testing NotificationProvider.

classes.name: AppNotification
classes.description: Model representing a notification in the system.

methods.name: loadNotifications
methods.description: Loads notifications from the database into the provider.

methods.name: addNotification
methods.description: Adds a new notification to the database and updates the list.

methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Marks a specified notification as read.

methods.name: dismissNotification
methods.description: Dismisses a notification, setting it as inactive or removing it.

methods.name: getNotificationsByType
methods.description: Retrieves notifications filtered by their type.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears any error messages in the provider.
